content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of a newly built, unfurnished, 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center of München.
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: To clarify, are you asking if I agreed on a final price for the rental of the apartment with Peter Schmidt?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer to the clarified question]

Yes, the answer to the clarified question is "Yes". We agreed on a price of 660 Euros per month for the apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: If yes, what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final price was 660 Euros per month for the apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Peter Schmidt, as an 8.
name: Maryam Abbasi

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content:
[Answer to the question]

No, at no point during the negotiation did I feel discriminated or offended.
name: Maryam Abbasi
